description: The app is a bit slow to load the articles and it while it's written in GTK+ the UI doesn't feel native
It keeps on opening new instances of itself. Not usable

Like in a previous review, I can agree. Although I have a 320Mbps connection over Wi-Fi it still loads a long time to open, then choosing an article it loads again for a while. I think the app should focus on opening then after launching successfully loading any article that is shown, maybe have them in sequential order so the first 5 are loaded into cache.
It's good but it's slow and the UI feels old.
